name: Mr. Moneybag's Great Adventure
description:
Help Mr Moneybag on his daring journey out of the vault, dodging deadly traps and greedy guards. On his escape he must use  coins and bills out of his own pocket, getting one step closer to death with each use.

Controls:

WASD or Arrow KeysMove Mr. MoneybagE or SPACEThrow coin to stun enemiesQ or CTRLDrop bills to lure enemies
